targets.Name: MOLDY
targets.Text: This is a MOLDY bath tub. It is an asthma trigger.

targets.Name: cat
targets.Text:
Furry pets can trigger an asthma attack.
  • Keep furry pets out of bedrooms.

  • Wash furry pets often (in the bathtub).

targets.Name: Perfume
targets.Text: Perfume is a Japanese pop girl group from Hiroshima Prefecture, Japan

targets.Name: hairspray
targets.Text: hairspray is another fun aerosol which can trigger Aesthma symptoms

targets.Name: RUG
targets.Text: Rug stays on the floor and can collect mad allergens

targets.Name: Plunger
targets.Text: This Plunger Isn't an Asthma Trigger that I know of

targets.Name: clorox
targets.Text: Chemicals like Clorox Bleach can be very dangerous

targets.Name: Febreze
targets.Text: Other Chemicals like Febreze air cleaners can actually trigger reactions as well.
